name: Push Me Pull You
description: Push Me Pull You is an award-winning local multiplayer game about friendship and wrestling. Joined at the waist, you and your partner share a long, wriggling body as you wrestle your opponents for control of the ball.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later (64-bit) Processor: Intel Dual Core @ 1.7ghz or equivalent Memory: 3 GB RAM Storage: 300 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This is one the great local multiplayer games. Great for parties. Up there with the likes of Towerfall and Gang Beasts.

A simplistic and fun game to play with friends. The game is great to play in groups, but that's all that it has going for it. The game has a great soundtrack, and the current game modes are pretty fun.  The only downsides to the game are that it's a bit pricey for what it is, and I feel that there could be some more modes. Other than that, the game is quite fun and I'd recommend it if it goes on sale.
